common.hero_headline_easy: Learning it doesn't have to be.
common.hero_subheadline: BioCactus is your AI-powered study companion for biotechnology â€” built like Duolingo, powered by cutting-edge language models, and designed to meet you exactly where you are.
common.problem_p1: Most biotech students hit the same wall. Textbooks are dense, lectures move too fast, and generic YouTube videos don't care whether you actually got it.
common.problem_p2: There's no one checking in. No one adjusting the pace. Just you, a PDF, and a prayer before the exam.
common.does_desc: BioCactus uses an LLM under the hood to generate lessons, quizzes, and explanations that adapt to your level â€” whether you're in high school touching DNA for the first time or a university student deep in recombinant protein expression.
common.feat_adaptive_desc: Every module adjusts based on what you know and what you're struggling with. The AI reads your progress and shifts the content accordingly â€” harder when you're crushing it, supportive when you're not.
common.feat_quiz_desc: Test your knowledge after every topic with AI-generated questions that go beyond multiple choice. Get instant explanations for every answer, right or wrong.
common.feat_path_desc: BioCactus maps out a learning journey based on your goals â€” whether you're prepping for an exam, exploring a topic out of curiosity, or trying to actually understand CRISPR once and for all.
common.feat_analytics_desc: See exactly where you're growing and where you're slipping. Your dashboard tracks streaks, weak spots, and progress over time so you stay in the loop on your own learning.
common.works_step1_desc: Pick your level and what you want to learn.
common.works_step2_desc: The AI builds your curriculum on the spot.
common.works_step3_desc: Short, focused, Duolingo-style lessons that fit into your actual life.
common.works_step4_desc: Reinforce what you learned with adaptive assessments.
common.works_step5_desc: Watch your understanding deepen over time with your analytics dashboard.
common.who_p1: Students who feel lost in their biotech classes. Self-learners who want to explore molecular biology, genetics, or biotech without a formal course. Anyone who's Googled "what is PCR" more than twice and still isn't sure.
common.who_p2: If you're curious about how life works at a molecular level â€” BioCactus is for you.
common.why_quote: "Unlike static courses or lecture recordings, BioCactus actually responds to you. It's not just content delivery â€” it's a learning conversation."
common.why_p1: You ask questions, you get personalized answers, and the whole experience reshapes itself around your brain.
common.why_p2: Think Duolingo, but for the science that's literally changing the world.
common.why_avatar_message: The future of labs is here.
